title: Bug 14943: Code Assist generates incorrect line endings on Windows
description: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends when generating code.
OB: When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code contains LF linefeeds on a Windows machine.
EB: Code Assist should generate code with CRLF line endings on Windows machines to maintain platform consistency.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the IDE and create a new class.
2. Add a method to the class.
3. Use Code Assist to define a local variable for an array within the method.
4. Observe the line endings in the generated code on a Windows machine.
